programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: Two veteran New York City detectives hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss (Guy Pearce) uses notes and his own tattoos to track his wife's killer.

programme.title: Fled
programme.desc: Laurence Fishburne and Stephen Baldwin star as two prisoners who flee during an escape attempt gone bad.

programme.title: The Royal Family At War
programme.desc: A dive into royal marriages and the rumored rift between Meghan Markle and the Duchess of Cambridge.

programme.title: The Royal Family At War
programme.desc: Biographer Penny Junor recalls the rumored rift between the Queen and the Duchess of Cornwall.

programme.title: The Last Waltz
programme.desc: The Band's farewell concert, filmed by Martin Scorsese, features legends like Dylan, Clapton, and Morrison.

programme.title: Rolling Stone Magazine: Stories From The Edge
programme.desc: A deep dive into the magazine’s origins and its early growth into a cultural and political pacesetter.

programme.title: The Story of Super Mario
programme.desc: Explore the history of Super Mario, Nintendo's iconic character that changed the world of gaming forever.

programme.title: The Eagles: The Long Road
programme.desc: Un homenaje a la vida y la carrera del cofundador y guitarrista de los Eagles, Glenn Frey.

programme.title: Dolly Parton: Big Hair Bigger Heart
programme.desc: From humble roots to icon status, Dolly Parton has built a rich legacy in music and beyond. This is her story.

programme.title: Lady Gaga: Dance Or Die
programme.desc: From underground clubs to global stardom, follow Lady Gaga’s rise as she redefines music, fashion, and fame.

programme.title: Scarface: The Al Capone Story
programme.desc: A look into the real Scarface, Alphonse Gabriel Capone, the most infamous gangster of all time.

programme.title: The Tragic Story of Patsy Cline
programme.desc: A celebration of Cline's powerful voice and her career that continues to inspire artists and fans alike.

programme.title: The Last 24 Hours: John Lennon
programme.desc: The final 24 hours of the ex-Beatle's life before he was murdered by Mark David Chapman.

programme.title: Tina Turner: Simply the Best
programme.desc: The odds were against her, but one day she emerged as Queen of Rock ‘n’ Roll. This is Tina Turner's story.

programme.title: Bobby & Whitney
programme.desc: Bobby and Whitney seem like a perfect match from the outside, but individual issues upset their potential.

programme.title: Street Smart
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman stars as a pimp who gets mistaken for a fictional pimp in a journalist's story.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A medical examiner uses a memory drug to solve his wife’s murder mystery. Stars Ray Liotta and Kim Cattrall.

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: A slacker commits a shocking act and reveals it to friends who become tormented with guilt. With Keanu Reeves.
